name: BIKEOUT
description:
BIKEOUT is an extreme dynamic game with a first— and third-person view, where you will be able to accelerate from the mountain, perform tricks flying over obstacles and carefully jump on rocks. The most important thing is not to crash and fall into the abyss during the downhill!

BIKEOUT Universe

The game has a lot of open scenic locations created manually using modern Unreal Engine 5 technologies, as well as branded "Bikeout" levels for hardcore players filled with attractions and dynamic obstacles. Fans of freeride were also not spared and added locations that have no restrictions — just you and your bike.

Pass all tests

Complete levels to unlock more challenging and dangerous routes or explore large freeride locations where you can plot your routes. Forest, mountains, rivers, lakes, plains or... pump-track, abandoned playgrounds and attractions! Improve your bike driving skills by performing stunts while jumping.

Features:

  • First and third person view
  • Mechanics of tricks performed in the air
  • Achievements for each level and for hidden tasks on the levels
  • Possibility of playing up to 4 players (in SplitScreen mode)
  • Cooperative mode
  • Full gamepad support
  • Different weather conditions and seasons
  • Realistic collisions and falls from the bike
  • Dynamic licensed music
  • Freeride mode

Shake off dust from the bike and go ahead to adventure!
